#summary Main wiki page for the Really Simple History JavaScript library.

= Beta release: 0.6 =

Version 0.6 was released as a beta on 10.23.2007 with an eye toward a full public release in a week or so.

  * [ReleaseNotesVersionZeroPointSix 0.6 beta release notes]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/reallysimplehistory/downloads/list 0.6 download]
  * [http://blogs.pathf.com/agileajax/2007/10/coming-soon-rea.html Brian's blog post] 

= Latest stable version: 0.4 =

Brad Neuberg's original 0.4 version from 2005 is still the latest public release.

  * [ReleaseNotesVersionZeroPointFour 0.4 release notes]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/reallysimplehistory/downloads/list 0.4 download]
